channel.title: Anomaly Detection on Nakatsuka Shunsuke

item.title: PaDiM: a Patch Distribution Modeling Framework for Anomaly Detection and Localization

item.title: Novelty Detection Via Blurring

item.title: Memorizing Normality to Detect Anomaly: Memory-augmented Deep Autoencoder for Unsupervised Anomaly Detection

item.title: Iterative energy-based projection on a normal data manifold for anomaly localization
